name: Nexapp Billling
query:
SELECT
    s.circuit_id AS "Circuit ID:Data:150",
    s.site_name AS "Site Name:Data:180",
    s.customer AS "Customer:Link/Customer:150",
    s.customer_type AS "Customer Type:Data:120",
    s.order_type AS "Order Type:Data:120",
    s.site_status AS "Site Status:Data:120",
    s.solution_name AS "Solution Name:Data:150",
    s.billing_status AS "Billing Status:Data:120",
    s.date AS "Circuit Delivery Date:Date:120",

    so.name AS "Sales Order:Link/Sales Order:150",
    so.po_no AS "PO No:Data:120",
    so.po_date AS "PO Date:Date:120",
    so.custom_po_end_date AS "PO End Date:Date:120",

    soi.item_name AS "Item Name:Data:150",
    soi.qty AS "Qty:Float:80",
    soi.rate AS "Rate:Currency:100",
    soi.amount AS "Amount:Currency:120",

    tci.item AS "OTC:Data:150",
    tci.custom_mrc AS "MRC:Currency:120",
    tci.recurring AS "ARC:Data:100"

FROM `tabSite` s
INNER JOIN `tabSales Order Item` soi
    ON s.circuit_id = soi.custom_feasibility
INNER JOIN `tabSales Order` so
    ON so.name = soi.parent AND so.docstatus = 1
LEFT JOIN `tabTask Circuit ID` tci
    ON tci.circuit_id = s.circuit_id
    AND tci.item = soi.item_name
WHERE soi.amount > 0
ORDER BY s.date DESC
LIMIT 10000;
